DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of MK-0928 in Primary Insomnia.
DOC.brief_title: Sleep Laboratory Study of MK0928 in Adult Patients With Primary Insomnia (0928-041)(TERMINATED)
DOC.criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of primary insomnia Patients with an active psychiatric disorder other than primary insomnia
